verses.verse: Then the Lord<WH3068> said<WH559> to Moses,<WH4872> "Go<WH935> to Pharaoh<WH6547> and speak<WH1696> to him, 'Thus<WH3541> says<WH559> the Lord,<WH3068> the God<WH430> of the Hebrews,<WH5680> "Let<WH7971> My people<WH5971> go,<WH7971> that they may serve<WH5647> Me.
"For if<WH518> you refuse<WH3986> to let<WH7971> [them] go,<WH7971> and continue<WH5750> to hold<WH2388> them,

behold,<WH2009> the hand<WH3027> of the Lord<WH3068> will come<WH1961> [with] a very<WH3966> severe<WH3515> pestilence<WH1698> on your livestock<WH4735> which<WH834> are in the field,<WH7704> on the horses,<WH5483> on the donkeys,<WH2543> on the camels,<WH1581> on the herds,<WH1241> and on the flocks.<WH6629>

"But the Lord<WH3068> will make<WH6395> a distinction<WH6395> between<WH996> the livestock<WH4735> of Israel<WH3478> and the livestock<WH4735> of Egypt,<WH4714> so that nothing<WH3808> <WH1697> will die<WH4191> of all<WH3605> that belongs to the sons<WH1121> of Israel.<WH3478>"' "
And the Lord<WH3068> set<WH7760> a definite<WH4150> time,<WH4150> saying,<WH559> "Tomorrow<WH4279> the Lord<WH3068> will do<WH6213> this<WH2088> thing<WH1697> in the land.<WH776>"

So the Lord<WH3068> did<WH6213> this<WH2088> thing<WH1697> on the morrow,<WH4283> and all<WH3605> the livestock<WH4735> of Egypt<WH4714> died;<WH4191> but of the livestock<WH4735> of the sons<WH1121> of Israel,<WH3478> not one<WH259> died.<WH4191>

And Pharaoh<WH6547> sent,<WH7971> and behold,<WH2009> there was not even<WH5704> one<WH259> of the livestock<WH4735> of Israel<WH3478> dead.<WH4191> But the heart<WH3820> of Pharaoh<WH6547> was hardened,<WH3513> and he did not let<WH7971> the people<WH5971> go.<WH7971>

Then the Lord<WH3068> said<WH559> to Moses<WH4872> and Aaron,<WH175> "Take<WH3947> for yourselves handfuls<WH4393> <WH2651> of soot<WH6368> from a kiln,<WH3536> and let Moses<WH4872> throw<WH2236> it toward the sky<WH8064> in the sight<WH5869> of Pharaoh.<WH6547>

"And it will become<WH1961> fine dust<WH80> over<WH5921> all<WH3605> the land<WH776> of Egypt,<WH4714> and will become<WH1961> boils<WH7822> breaking<WH9457> out with sores<WH76> on man<WH120> and beast<WH929> through all<WH3605> the land<WH776> of Egypt.<WH4714>"

So they took<WH3947> soot<WH6368> from a kiln,<WH3536> and stood<WH5975> before<WH6440> Pharaoh;<WH6547> and Moses<WH4872> threw<WH2236> it toward the sky,<WH8064> and it became<WH1961> boils<WH7822> breaking<WH9457> out with sores<WH76> on man<WH120> and beast.<WH929>

And the magicians<WH2748> could<WH3201> not stand<WH5975> before<WH6440> Moses<WH4872> because<WH4480> <WH6440> of the boils,<WH7822> for the boils<WH7822> were on the magicians<WH2748> as well as on all<WH3605> the Egyptians.<WH4714>
And the Lord<WH3068> hardened<WH2388> Pharaoh's heart,<WH3820> and he did not listen<WH8085> to them, just<WH9201> as the Lord<WH3068> had spoken<WH1696> to Moses.<WH4872>

Then the Lord<WH3068> said<WH559> to Moses,<WH4872> "Rise<WH7925> up early<WH7925> in the morning<WH1242> and stand<WH3320> before<WH6440> Pharaoh<WH6547> and say<WH559> to him, 'Thus<WH3541> says<WH559> the Lord,<WH3068> the God<WH430> of the Hebrews,<WH5680> "Let<WH7971> My people<WH5971> go,<WH7971> that they may serve<WH5647> Me.

"For this<WH2088> time<WH6471> I will send<WH7971> all<WH3605> My plagues<WH4046> on you and your servants<WH5650> and your people,<WH5971> so<WH5668> that you may know<WH3045> that there<WH369> is no<WH369> one<WH369> like<WH3644> Me in all<WH3605> the earth.<WH776>

"For [if by] now<WH6258> I had put<WH7971> forth<WH7971> My hand<WH3027> and struck<WH5221> you and your people<WH5971> with pestilence,<WH1698> you would then have been cut<WH3582> off<WH3582> from the earth.<WH776>

"But, indeed,<WH199> for this<WH2088> cause<WH5668> I have allowed you to remain,<WH5975> in order<WH5668> to show<WH7200> you My power,<WH3581> and in order<WH4616> to proclaim<WH5608> My name<WH8034> through all<WH3605> the earth.<WH776>
"Still<WH5750> you exalt<WH5549> yourself against My people<WH5971> by not letting<WH7971> them go.<WH7971>

"Behold,<WH2009> about this time<WH6256> tomorrow,<WH4279> I will send<WH4305> a very<WH3966> heavy<WH3515> hail,<WH1259> such<WH834> as has not been<WH1961> [seen] in Egypt<WH4714> from the day<WH3117> it was founded<WH3245> until<WH5704> now.<WH6258>

"Now<WH6258> therefore send,<WH7971> bring<WH5756> your livestock<WH4735> and whatever<WH3605> <WH834> you have in the field<WH7704> to safety.<WH5756> Every<WH3605> man<WH120> and beast<WH929> that is found<WH4672> in the field<WH7704> and is not brought<WH622> home,<WH1004> when the hail<WH1259> comes<WH3381> down<WH3381> on them, will die.<WH4191>"' "

The one<WH4480> among the servants<WH5650> of Pharaoh<WH6547> who feared<WH3372> the word<WH1697> of the Lord<WH3068> made his servants<WH5650> and his livestock<WH4735> flee<WH5127> into the houses;<WH1004>
but he who<WH834> paid<WH7760> no<WH3808> regard<WH7760> <WH3820> to the word<WH1697> of the Lord<WH3068> left<WH5800> his servants<WH5650> and his livestock<WH4735> in the field.<WH7704>

Now the Lord<WH3068> said<WH559> to Moses,<WH4872> "Stretch<WH5186> out your hand<WH3027> toward<WH5921> the sky,<WH8064> that hail<WH1259> may fall<WH1961> on all<WH3605> the land<WH776> of Egypt,<WH4714> on man<WH120> and on beast<WH929> and on every<WH3605> plant<WH6212> of the field,<WH7704> throughout the land<WH776> of Egypt.<WH4714>"

And Moses<WH4872> stretched<WH5186> out his staff<WH4294> toward<WH5921> the sky,<WH8064> and the Lord<WH3068> sent<WH5414> thunder<WH6963> and hail,<WH1259> and fire<WH784> ran<WH1980> down to the earth.<WH776> And the Lord<WH3068> rained<WH4305> hail<WH1259> on the land<WH776> of Egypt.<WH4714>

So there was hail,<WH1259> and fire<WH784> flashing<WH3947> continually in the midst<WH8432> of the hail,<WH1259> very<WH3966> severe,<WH3515> such<WH834> as had not been<WH1961> in all<WH3605> the land<WH776> of Egypt<WH4714> since<WH9241> it became<WH1961> a nation.<WH1471>

And the hail<WH1259> struck<WH5221> all<WH3605> that was in the field<WH7704> through all<WH3605> the land<WH776> of Egypt,<WH4714> both<WH4480> man<WH120> and beast;<WH929> the hail<WH1259> also struck<WH5221> every<WH3605> plant<WH6212> of the field<WH7704> and shattered<WH7665> every<WH3605> tree<WH6086> of the field.<WH7704>
Only<WH7534> in the land<WH776> of Goshen,<WH1657> where<WH834> <WH8033> the sons<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> [were,] there was no<WH3808> hail.<WH1259>

Then Pharaoh<WH6547> sent<WH7971> for Moses<WH4872> and Aaron,<WH175> and said<WH559> to them, "I have sinned<WH2398> this<WH6471> time;<WH6471> the Lord<WH3068> is the righteous<WH6662> one,<WH6662> and I and my people<WH5971> are the wicked<WH7563> ones.<WH7563>

"Make<WH6279> supplication<WH6279> to the Lord,<WH3068> for there has been enough<WH7227> of God's thunder<WH6963> and hail;<WH1259> and I will let<WH7971> you go,<WH7971> and you shall stay<WH5975> no<WH3808> longer.<WH3254>"

And Moses<WH4872> said<WH559> to him, "As soon as I go<WH3318> out of the city,<WH5892> I will spread<WH6566> out my hands<WH3709> to the Lord;<WH3068> the thunder<WH6963> will cease,<WH2308> and there will be hail<WH1259> no<WH3808> longer,<WH5750> that you may know<WH3045> that the earth<WH776> is the Lord's.
"But as for you and your servants,<WH5650> I know<WH3045> that you do not yet<WH2962> fear<WH3372> the Lord<WH3068> God.<WH430>"
(Now the flax<WH6594> and the barley<WH8184> were ruined,<WH5221> for the barley<WH8184> was in the ear<WH24> and the flax<WH6594> was in bud.<WH1392>
But the wheat<WH2406> and the spelt<WH3698> were not ruined,<WH5221> for they [ripen] late.<WH648>)

So Moses<WH4872> went<WH3318> out of the city<WH5892> from Pharaoh,<WH6547> and spread<WH6566> out his hands<WH3709> to the Lord;<WH3068> and the thunder<WH6963> and the hail<WH1259> ceased,<WH2308> and rain<WH4306> no<WH3808> longer poured<WH5413> on the earth.<WH776>

But when Pharaoh<WH6547> saw<WH7200> that the rain<WH4306> and the hail<WH1259> and the thunder<WH6963> had ceased,<WH2308> he sinned<WH2398> again<WH3254> and hardened<WH3513> his heart,<WH3820> he and his servants.<WH5650>

And Pharaoh's heart<WH3820> was hardened,<WH2388> and he did not let<WH7971> the sons<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> go,<WH7971> just<WH9201> as the Lord<WH3068> had spoken<WH1696> through<WH3027> Moses.<WH4872>
